alert.note: Alert for South Washington Coast (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 15 at 2:35AM PST until January 15 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Washington, South Washington Coast. In Oregon, North Oregon Coast. * WHEN...Until 8 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. It will be difficult to see cyclists, pedestrians, and other vehicles due to the dense fog. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dense fog will be most widespread along the Columbia River, including Astoria and Megler.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
